references.paper_title: Objaverse: A universe of annotated 3d objects
references.reason: This paper introduces Objaverse, a large-scale dataset of 3D objects used as the foundation for creating the Articulation-XL benchmark dataset, crucial for training the proposed method.
This paper expands on Objaverse by introducing Objaverse-XL, an even larger dataset which serves as the basis for Articulation-XL, enabling the training of more robust and generalizable models.

references.paper_title: Automatic rigging and animation of 3d characters
references.reason: This is a foundational paper in automatic rigging and animation of 3D characters that the current work builds upon and improves.

references.paper_title: Predicting animation skeletons for 3d articulated models via volumetric nets
references.reason: This paper proposes a volumetric network for skeleton generation, which is a related method that the current work improves upon.

references.paper_title: RigNet: Neural rigging for articulated characters
references.reason: This paper introduces RigNet, a strong baseline model for skeleton generation and skinning weight prediction that is compared against in the current work.
